msbt.message:
Thanks for the housewarming card.
Now that the house is warmed, can I still keep the present you sent with it?

Thanks for the housewarming card! I loved it AND the gift!
I wanted to give you something too so there's a thing attached!
It was so nice of you to send me that housewarming gift, ! Lemme warm your house up now!

Your housewarming card made me happy! I'm unpacking my stuff. I've got crates of snacks, bugs to put in the floors, and I gotta figure out how to put my bed together...but your card makes it all easier!
I was so nervous when I first moved here... But your note helped me relax! Thanks, ! You should come chill at my place sometime. I have snacks!
You sent me a letter and that was cool! I just got here, and I don't even know my own address, so I dunno how you figured it out!
